text: You wake up on a beach with only a butter knife, two thick wooly socks, and a beat-up set of clothes. An ant the size of a horse turns its massive head to see you and begins to charge!

choices.text: Throw the butter knife at the ant
Try to reason with the giant ant

text: You reach the water's edge and notice a small boat tied up. You jump in and paddle away, hoping to find help.

choices.text: Ask for help at the nearest village
Continue paddling until you find land

text: You reach a bustling town where people are eager to assist.

choices.text: Ask for directions from an old woman

text: You discover a hidden treasure map.
You find your way to the king's palace.
The children lead you to a secret underground hideout.
The river leads you into a dead end, and you must turn back.

choices.text: Cross the river and explore further

text: You find a hidden cave containing an ancient artifact.
You discover a secret path that leads you to safety.
The river's current becomes too strong, and you are swept away downstream.
After hours of paddling, you spot some buildings in the distance.
You discover a hidden village that needs your help.
The buildings turn out to be an abandoned fort, but you find useful supplies inside.
As you turn back, you notice smoke on the horizon. You realize too late that you should have sought help.
The knife hits the ant's head but doesn't seem to faze it. It charges faster!
The ant speeds past you, and you barely manage to avoid getting stung. You decide that this adventure is too dangerous for your taste.

choices.text: Face your fears and continue forward

text: You safely return home, never to embark on such a perilous journey again.
After some time, you reach the end of the adventure, having encountered no further danger or obstacles.
As you press onward, you come face-to-face with an even more dangerous situation. You narrowly escape with your life and complete the adventure, feeling proud of yourself for overcoming your fears.
You throw the second knife with precision, hitting the ant squarely in its head. It falls lifeless at your feet.
You find a small, intricately carved amulet around its neck.
As you continue walking, you come across an old cabin. You decide to investigate it.
While searching, you discover another knife and two arrows hidden in a hollowed-out tree trunk nearby.
You reach out and grab the ant, only for it to bite down on your finger, injecting you with a powerful venom.

choices.text: You crush the ant, ending its life.
You flick the ant away from you.
You carefully remove the ant using tweezers.

text: The venom quickly spreads through your body, causing intense pain and eventually death. Game Over.
The ant's bite was harmless without its venom. You continue on your adventure unharmed.
With the ant safely removed, you can now examine it for clues or crush it to extract any useful substances. Continue?
To your surprise, the giant ant listens to you and explains that it has been guarding a treasure chest buried nearby. You can work together to retrieve it or continue on your original quest.

choices.text: Work together with the giant ant
Continue on your original quest alone
Try to deceive the giant ant

text: You and the giant ant successfully retrieve the treasure chest, sharing it equally.

choices.text: Follow the giant ant back home
Divide the treasure and part ways

text: The chest contains a map leading to more treasures.
The giant ant reveals its true form as an evil sorcerer who plans to conquer the world with your newfound wealth!
You both go your separate ways, never to meet again.
You complete your original quest and find great success in doing so.

choices.text: Ask the wise old man for guidance.

text: You discover a hidden treasure and become incredibly wealthy.
Upon returning, you find your village has been ravaged by an unknown enemy. You must now seek revenge.
The wise old man reveals that the true quest lies within yourself, and you embark on a journey of self-discovery.
The giant ant discovers your deceit and attacks you, causing you to fail this part of your adventure.

choices.text: Try to reason with the ant

text: You manage to defeat the giant ant, but it's not easy. You find a hidden passage behind its nest.
The ants give chase as you run through their colony. You narrowly escape and continue your adventure elsewhere.
To your surprise, the ant listens to your plea for mercy. It lets you pass, but warns that if it ever catches you lying again, there will be consequences.
